trans-unit.source: Represents information about a specific cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa informações sobre uma célula específica em um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This structure provides information about the cell and the data item associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Essa estrutura fornece informações sobre a célula e o item de dados associado à célula.

trans-unit.source: It is used instead of a reference to the actual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> container when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> gets a cell; for example, in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ele é usado em vez de uma referência para o valor real <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell>contêiner quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>obtém uma célula; por exemplo, no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> structure for the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> estrutura para a célula especificada.

trans-unit.source: This constructor associates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo> with the specific <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> instance that owns the cell container.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor associa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo>com específico <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>instância que possui o contêiner de célula.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo>

trans-unit.source: The cell for which information is to be generated.
trans-unit.target: A célula para a qual informações são a ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> structure using the specified data item and column.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> usando o item de dados especificado e a coluna de estrutura.

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not associate the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo> with a specific <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> instance.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor não associa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo>com um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>instância.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo>

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: O item de dados para a linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: A coluna que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coluna que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: A coluna que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified object is equal to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o objeto especificado é igual à instância atual.

trans-unit.source: This method compares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that owns the cell container.
trans-unit.target: Este método compara o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>que possui o contêiner de célula.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado à instância atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the comparison object represents the same cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o objeto de comparação representa a mesma célula; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um código hash para a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the structure.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para a estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the structure holds valid information.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a estrutura contém informações válidas.

trans-unit.source: This property verifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property is not <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade verifica se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>propriedade não é <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName>e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>propriedade não é `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the structure has valid information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a estrutura tem informações válidas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item for the row that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item de dados para a linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: O item de dados para a linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Indica se dois <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> instâncias são iguais.

trans-unit.source: This operator compares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that owns the cell container.
trans-unit.target: Este operador compara o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>que possui o contêiner de célula.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira estrutura a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda estrutura a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two structures represent the same cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se duas estruturas representam a mesma célula; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Indica se dois <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> instâncias não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: This operator compares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that owns the cell container.
trans-unit.target: Este operador compara o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>que possui o contêiner de célula.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira estrutura a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda estrutura a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two structures do not represent the same cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se duas estruturas não representam a mesma célula; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
